welcome_message_body: Welcome to Beijing, a city rich in history, culture, and delicious cuisine. Get ready to explore the iconic Great Wall, the Forbidden City, and the bustling markets, and immerse yourself in the charm of this vibrant city. Enjoy your time here!

restaurants.name: Din Tai Fung (鼎泰丰)
restaurants.description: Din Tai Fung (鼎泰丰) is a dumpling restaurant located in 北京市.
restaurants.address: 138 Wangfujing Ave (At 6/F of apm Mall), Wángfǔ jǐng, 北京市, 北京市, 100006

restaurants.name: Lost Heaven 花马天堂
restaurants.description: Lost Heaven 花马天堂 is a yunnan restaurant located in 北京市.
restaurants.address: 23 Qianmen E Ave, 北京市, 北京市, 100000

restaurants.name: Beijing Pie (河沿肉饼)
restaurants.description: Beijing Pie (河沿肉饼) is a chinese restaurant located in 北京市.
restaurants.address: 159-2 Bei He Yan Ave, 北京市, 北京市, 100000

restaurants.name: 四季民福烤鸭店
restaurants.description: 四季民福烤鸭店 is a peking duck restaurant located in 景山.
restaurants.address: 南池子大街11号, 景山, 北京市

restaurants.name: Bian Yi Fang (便宜坊烤鸭店)
restaurants.description: Bian Yi Fang (便宜坊烤鸭店) is a peking duck restaurant located in the city.
restaurants.address: 东城区前门大街东侧鲜鱼口老字号餐饮一条街 (鲜鱼口店)
